description.value: A weapon fitted with asunderingfusion triggers destructive shockwaves in objects it hits, granting glancing blows the forcefulness of direct hits. The weapon gains the sunder weapon special property (Armory30). Only weapons that deal bludgeoning damage can benefit from this fusion.

modifiers.name: Sundering Fusion
modifiers.notes: The Sundering fusion gives your weapon the sunder weapon special property. you gain a +2 bonus when you attempt a sunder combat maneuver.
